name: Fox & Flock
description: There is a Fox in the ballroom! Or so the whispers from the other ballroom dancers suggest. Can the Flock trap the Fox before it is too late? Or will the Fox systematically eat all the other dancers before they even realize he is in their midst?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware accelerated graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 311 MB available space
